author: yperbasis
content: EVM performance is important, but at the moment pure computational performance is not the main bottleneck (though it probably holds the second place). The top performance bottleneck is state (accounts, storage) access (reading & writing). That's why efforts like improved DB layout in Erigon are so important (https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon#key-features). For potential future improvements see Vitalik's https://hackmd.io/@vbuterin/state_expiry_paths
